document_data.caption: A wizard arms himself with bloodstars.
document_data.name: Bloodstars
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bloodstars''''' was a rare [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s.{{Cite dragon/200/The Wizards Three: Once more the three|24}}
document_data.Effects:
''Bloodstars'' created seven spiky electrical stars from the caster's blood that whirled around the caster. The caster could direct the ''bloodstars'' to attack up to seven different targets, though only one ''bloodstar'' could strike a particular target at any given time. ''Bloodstars'' could not move more than {{SI|90|ft|long=yes}} from the caster. ''Bloodstars'' moved with dashing speed and accuracy, ignoring armor and other non-magical barriers.

When striking a target, a ''bloodstar'' lodged itself in the target to cause harm. Once the ''bloodstar'' was attached, the caster could detonate it when they wished to cause additional harm to the target and any other creature standing within {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}. ''Bloodstars'', even upon exploding, never harmed the caster.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required drops of the caster's blood to cast.
